scripts.build: parcel build script/leap-motion/Element.js -d . --out-file leap-motion.js --no-source-maps --no-cache && cp leap-motion.js extension & cp leap-motion.js max/jweb/script
scripts.build-server: parcel build script/leap-motion/LeapMotion.js -d node --out-file LeapMotion.js --no-source-maps --no-cache && cp node/LeapMotion.js max/node-for-max
